CellSPA 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    CellSPA()

    A wrapper function to calculate all metrics

    calAggExpressionCorrelation()

    Calculate association with the reference for the aggregated profile

    calBaselineAllMetrics()

    Calculate the baseline metrics of cell from cell segmentation output

    calBaselineCellMetrics()

    Calculate the baseline metrics of segmented cell from cell segmentation output

    calBaselineCellShapeMetrics()

    Calculate the baseline metrics of cell shapes from cell segmentation output

    calExpressionCorrelation()

    Calculate association with the reference

    calMarkerPct()

    Calculate marker expression purity for each cell given a marker list

    calMarkerPurity()

    Calculate marker purity for each cell given a marker list

    calNegMarkerVsDist()

    Calculate the spatial diversity of base line metrics

    calSpatialMetricsDiversity()

    Calculate the spatial diversity of base line metrics

    generateMarkerList()

    Generating marker list using the reference data

    generatePolygon()

    Generating polygon

    processingRef()

    Preprocessing the the reference scRNA-seq data

    processingSPE()

    Preprocessing the the spatial experiment data.

    readBIDCell()

    Read BIDCell output

    readTiffOutput()

    Read Tiff output from BIDCell

    readVizgen()

    Read Vizgen output

    readXenium()

    Read Xenium output

    spe

    An example SpatialExperiment data

    subset()

    Subset Spatial experiment object by column
